title: Old Starter Hat Font
content:
Anyone know what this font is called used to write "raiders"?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [raidershat.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111219044507/http:/typophile.com/files/raidershat.jpg) | 79.26 KB |
author: Rideordie

comments.content:
This doesn't look familiar, and that doesn't surprise me, because the NFL and other American Pro leagues are very protective of merchandising rights, and usually design custom logos and lettering for franchises, so that they can control all the branding.

- Mike Yanega
still need help. This isnt a font specific for any 1 team...Starter used this font to write every single team they made a hat for.
